itunes:title: Audiobook Gateway
title: Audiobook Gateway
description:
In Episode 4 of Book Talk, Etc. Tina and Renee are talking about Audiobook gateways! They share what they're loving lately, their latest read, a shelf addition, and have book talk aboutÂ  why they love audiobooks, how they listen, and share a few of their favorite gateway audiobook recommendations

Loving Lately
1:24 Chom Chom Pet Roller
2:53 For Real: The Story of Reality TV

Latest Read
4:05 The Last Thing He Told Me - Laura DaveÂ  (narrator Rebecca Lowman)
6:24 The Plot - Jean Hanff KorelitzÂ  (narrator Kirby Hayborne)

Book Talk
20:19 The Light Between Oceans- ML StedmanÂ  (narrator M. L. Stedman)
22:10 Maybe You Should Talk to Someone - Lori GottliebÂ  (Narrator Brittney Pressley)
25:16 11/22/63- Stephen KingÂ  (narrator Craig Wasson)
27:30 His and Hers - Alice FeeneyÂ  (narrators Stephanie Racine, Richard Armitage)
30:04 Then She Was Gone - Lisa JewellÂ  (narrator Helen Duff)
32:36 The Hate U Give- Angie ThomasÂ  (narrator Bahni Turpin)
35:27I'm Not Dying with You Tonight- Kimberly Jones Gilly Siegal (narrator Brittney Pressley & Channie Waites)
37:43 The Fountains of Silence - Ruta SepteysÂ  (full cast)

Shelf Additions
43:18 Friends Like These- Kimberly McCreight
41:03 To Paradise- Hanya Yanagihara

Other Books Mentioned
Scribd ( audiobook subscription service)
Call Me God- Jim Clemente
Concrete Rose - Angie Thomas (narrator Dion Graham)
The Invisible Life of Addie Larue- VE SchwabÂ  (narrator Julia Whelan)
